message.value: Starting Mumble server command line
Ignoring arguments, arguments expected: "<name> [<simple>|<standalone>] <configuration port> <vocal port> <game port>"

<name>
<configuration port>
<vocal port>
<game port>
To perform changes on a Mumble server
To open a Mumble server
Cannot open a Mumble server, the server name is missing
Cannot open %s, the server type is missing
Cannot open %s, the server type must be either "simple" or "standalone"
Cannot open %s, the configuration port number is missing
Cannot open %s, the configuration port number has a bad format, expected an integer
Cannot open %s, the vocal port number is missing
Cannot open %s, the vocal port number has a bad format, expected an integer
Cannot open %s, the vocal port number should not be equal to the configuration port number

Cannot open %s, the game port number has a bad format, expected an integer
Cannot open %s, the game port number must neither be equal to the configuration port number nor the vocal port number

To close a Mumble server
The Mumble server %s has been closed
To add/remove channels from a server or to add/remove players from a channel
